item.description:
The cost for the Wadsworth Atheneum's Phoenix Afterhours Party is $5.00.  That gets you into the museum, food, cash bar, and the movie.  The party runs from 5:00 pm-8:00 pm.  The movie starts at 8:00 pm.

 

"Monsoon Wedding" A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the downstairs lobby before the film.
item.why: The Wadsworth Atheneum is having their monthly cocktail party and a free movie too.
item.name: Phoenix Afterhours & A Movie "Monsoon Wedding"
